Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel, Very modern”
Reviews.Author: USA_SIN_IT
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night, in order to catch a flight out of Fiumicino Airport. It is not in the city center, but there is a great shopping mall within walking distance. The staff was all very friendly and the room was very clean. The bathroom was one of the nicest I've seen in Europe. Although we were also curious about the bath salts in a bathroom with only a shower! The only downside was that the bathroom was quick to flood from the shower water and the drainage wasn't the best. The breakfast was very tasty and the wait stuff very friendly. We will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Exotic boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: Alexander G
Reviews.Content: The last stop in our fourteen-day trip around Europe was Rome, and we stayed at the OP Hotel overnight. The hotel looked interesting from the start - the decor in the lobby was amazing for one thing. Of course, ambience does not always matter. We had dinner in the hotel (if I do recall correctly), but I skipped halfway due to the big platter and possibly some difficulty eating the dish. The dessert was nice, though. After dinner, we went up to our rooms. For one, the rooms were very modern and new. The toilets were unbelievably clean, and bath salts were provided as well. It was very cosy and was suitable for the two of us - mother and son. I opted to use Wi-Fi, which I believe was either a small sum to pay or free, but we had trouble accessing it. OP Hotel staff let us use the reception computers, which was a first, to help in getting my wi-fi ready. That service was pretty good, and even though there was a bit of a language barrier, all turned out well. All in all, OP Hotel is a pretty nice place to stay in if you're on a tour or just looking for a hotel. I'm unsure about the location (it was about a 20-min bus ride from Vatican) and I heard there was some supermarket nearby. I wouldn't mind staying here again on a future tour.

Reviews.Title: “details ...”
Reviews.Author: LucaDea
Reviews.Content: I've been here for a one night business travel. The hotel is new and in a very good position if you have an appointment in any office around EUR. Even if the hote il brand new (I think opened just few months ago) there are some paint problems in the room I was staying in. The bathroom is nice but the details are weird: salts bath in a bathroom with a shower, what for? :-) The restaurant is very good, an excellent choice of plates, pretty unusual for a hotel restaurant; and they are very well cooked as well. I'd suggest the tiramisù with Nutella drops in it as dessert: delicious! Be aware that if you're in the unlukly situation where there is a group of tourist staying at the same hotel you may find out that the breakfast is finished before you can even have the chance to enter the bar ... I'd suggest the hotel to better manage big tourist group reserving them a dedicated breakfast room or the other guests may be QUITE upset!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent for EUR business area and Microsoft employees”
Reviews.Author: fantadani
Reviews.Content: This hotel is really good of you news to accomodate in the Rome's business area and it is just besides Microsoft Rome's offices: if you're a Mieosoft partner, customer or employee this should be your first choice. Hotel is pretty new and it is really modern with gentle colours and silence in case you need some relax after the business rush. Rooms are well cleaned, HD TVs available in all rooms with very comfortable beds.

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: facebookjunky
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here the first night of our Italy vacation. It was beautiful! We were greeted by friendly staff. The rooms were spacious, clean and beautiful. The only thing they could have improved was having a bartender behind the bar. All we wanted to start off our vacation was a "to our vacation" cocktail. There was no bartender in sight. After waiting about 45 mins one showed up, only to disappear again. That's not really important, but would have been nice! All in all the hotel was great!

Reviews.Title: “BAD LOCATION”
Reviews.Author: AGGELOS33
Reviews.Content: For a tourist the location of the hotel is far away from the centre of the city and the bus, which stops in front of the hotel to take you to the metro, was always late. It takes you about 45 minutes to go down to the centre of the city (3 stops for the bus and 9 stops for the train, if they are in time both). In addition, we stayed there for 4 nights and they even didn´t change our sheets.The breakfast wasn´t something special for a 4 star hotel and broke down my expectations.Also, there wasn´t internet access in the hotel. In contrast, the room had a very good bathroom and the hotel was near to Euroma 2 complex, if you are a shopping traveller.

Reviews.Title: “New hotel with good infrastructure but bad personnel behavior”
Reviews.Author: shelman_10
Reviews.Content: Room was spacy and clean and bathroom was big and working all well. Breakfast was very good and replenishment continuous. I cannot believe that this good design hides an inappropriate, bad behaving and not servicing well personnel. Noone said a goodmorning or hello when entering the hotel or entering the restaurant for breakfast.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel but... I got robbed”
Reviews.Author: Vari1
Reviews.Content: The infrastructure was great, neat, clean and breakfast was very good as well. I would have qualified as excellent (value wise) but in 10 minutes that I left my bedroom run downstais to meet a friend came back up, EU80.00 were taken from my night stand. Inmediately run downstairs to ask the name of the cleaning lady who entered the room, the lady showed up and insisted that she thought I was tipping her... I could have bought that excuse but one of my friends came down stairs right that minute and he had EU400 taken.... while he went into the bathroom to take a shower... So just watch it very closely
